body: I thought it was nice to have them not in sync :).  Because e.g. you don't care about the AutoGPU index on the python side, but you do on the torch side and I wanted to make that clear.  But there's probably a better way to do it, I'll think about it.

body_text: I thought it was nice to have them not in sync :).  Because e.g. you don't care about the AutoGPU index on the python side, but you do on the torch side and I wanted to make that clear.  But there's probably a better way to do it, I'll think about it.
